quotes.author: A P J Abdul Kalam
quotes.quoteText: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.quoteText: Don't Compare yourself with anyone in this world. If you do so, you are insulting yourself.

quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quotes.quoteText: If you can not fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you cant' walk than crawl but whatever you do, keep moving forward.

quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.quoteText: Be the change you wish to see in the world

quotes.author: Warren Buffett
quotes.quoteText: No matter how great the talent or efforts, some things just take time. You can’t produce a baby in one month by getting nine women pregnant.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quoteText: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life
